name: care
trans: n. 关怀；照料；谨慎；忧虑 vi. 照顾；关心；喜爱；顾虑 vt. 在意；希望或喜欢 n. (Care)人名；(英)凯尔；(塞)察蕾

sentences.english: ‘He looked angry.’ ‘ I don’t care !’
sentences.chinese: “他好像很生气。”“我不管！”

sentences.english: She felt that nobody cared.
sentences.chinese: 她觉得没有人在乎。

sentences.english: The picture had been drawn with great care.
sentences.chinese: 这幅图画得非常用心。

detailed_translations.english: to think that something is important, so that you are interested in it, worried about it etc
when you are careful to avoid damage, mistakes etc

name: dad
trans: n. 爸爸；爹爹 n. (Dad)人名；(孟、巴基、阿富)达德；(泰)达

sentences.english: She lives with her mom and dad.
sentences.chinese: 她和爸爸妈妈一起住。

sentences.english: Dad, will you help me?
sentences.chinese: 爸爸，帮我一下好吗？

detailed_translations.english: father

name: grow
trans: vi. 发展；生长；渐渐变得… vt. 使生长；种植；扩展 n. (Grow)人名；(英)格罗

sentences.english: Support for Mr Thompson is growing.
sentences.chinese: 汤普森先生的支持率在上升。

sentences.english: a tree which will grow well in most types of soil
sentences.chinese: 在大部分土壤里都能生长得很好的一种树

detailed_translations.english: to become bigger, taller etc over a period of time in the process of becoming an adult

name: guard
trans: n. 守卫；警戒；护卫队；防护装置 vi. 警惕 vt. 保卫；监视 n. (Guard)人名；(英)格尔德

sentences.english: The Sergeant told Swift to guard the entrance.
sentences.chinese: 中士叫斯威夫特守着入口。

sentences.english: a lioness guarding her cubs
sentences.chinese: 守护着幼狮的母狮

sentences.english: There were two security guards on duty outside the building.
sentences.chinese: 大楼外面有两名保安在值勤。

detailed_translations.english: to protect a person, place, or object by staying near them and watching them
someone whose job is to protect a place or person

name: help
trans: vt. 帮助；促进；治疗；补救 n. 帮助；补救办法；帮忙者；有益的东西 vi. 帮助；有用；招待 n. (Help)人名；(芬)海尔普

sentences.english: If there’s anything I can do to help, just give me a call.
sentences.chinese: 如果需要我帮忙，就给我打个电话。

sentences.english: Thank you for all your help.
sentences.chinese: 感谢你的一切帮助。

detailed_translations.english: to make it possible or easier for someone to do something by doing part of their work or by giving them something they need
things you do to make it easier or possible for someone to do something

name: young
trans: adj. 年轻的；初期的；没有经验的 n. 年轻人；（动物的）崽，仔 n. (Young)人名；(中)杨(广东话·威妥玛)；(柬)永；(英、葡)扬

sentences.chinese: 幼儿

sentences.english: He’s younger than me.
sentences.chinese: 他比我小。

sentences.english: You’re too young to get married.
sentences.chinese: 你还太小，不能结婚。

sentences.english: young trees
sentences.chinese: 小树

sentences.chinese: 我年轻时候想当模特。

sentences.english: John was a great footballer in his younger days(= when he was younger ).
sentences.chinese: 约翰年轻时是个很棒的足球运动员。

detailed_translations.chinese: 年轻的；初期的；没有经验的
detailed_translations.english: a young person, plant, or animal has not lived for very long
young people

name: bill
trans: n. [法] 法案；广告；账单；[金融] 票据；钞票；清单 vt. 宣布；开账单；用海报宣传

sentences.english: Have you paid the phone bill?
sentences.chinese: 电话费你付了吗？

detailed_translations.english: a written list showing how much you have to pay for services you have received, work that has been done etc

name: Brazil
trans: n. 巴西（拉丁美洲国家）

sentences.english: Brazil has a big surplus of coffee.
sentences.chinese: 巴西有很多剩余咖啡。

sentences.english: Today's football match is France versus Brazil.
sentences.chinese: 今天的足球赛是法国队对巴西队。

sentences.english: Brazil has thrown up many world-famous footballers.
sentences.chinese: 巴西出了许多闻名世界的足球运动员。

name: insect
trans: n. 昆虫；卑鄙的人

sentences.english: an insect bite
sentences.chinese: 昆虫的叮咬

sentences.english: flying insects
sentences.chinese: 飞虫

sentences.english: Don’t forget to bring insect repellant (= a chemical to keep insects away ).
sentences.chinese: 不要忘记带上驱虫剂。

detailed_translations.english: a small creature such as a fly or ant, that has six legs, and sometimes wings

name: mane
trans: n. （马等的）鬃毛 n. (Mane)人名；(法、塞、几、冈、意、安哥、几比)马内；(日)真根 (名)

sentences.chinese: 马的鬃毛可以随其身体一起刷洗。

detailed_translations.english: the long hair on the back of a horse’s neck, or around the face and neck of a lion

name: poison
trans: n. 毒药；极有害的思想；抑制剂；中子吸收剂；有毒害的人（或行为等） vt. 毒害；下毒；败坏；污染（地区、空气等）；抑制......的活性 adj. 有毒的 n. (Poison) （美、爱、英）波伊松（人名）

sentences.english: Belladonna and red arsenic are deadly poisons .
sentences.chinese: 颠茄和雄黄都是致命的毒物。

sentences.english: a box of rat poison
sentences.chinese: 一盒鼠药

sentences.english: He killed several people by poisoning their tea.
sentences.chinese: 他在茶里下毒杀死了几个人。

detailed_translations.english: a substance that can cause death or serious illness if you eat it, drink it etc
to give someone poison, especially by adding it to their food or drink, in order to harm or kill them

name: rodent
trans: n. 啮齿目动物（如老鼠等） adj. （与） 啮齿动物（有关）的

sentences.chinese: 这真的是怪兽，有点像啮齿动物，但长着恐龙一样的嘴巴。

sentences.chinese: 但是，这项新的研究发现，70%的啮齿动物和灵长目动物的物种具有阑尾。

sentences.english: Like Plasmodium, which cycles between mosquitoes and man, Toxoplasma cycles between its rodent and feline hosts, living out different phases of its existence in each.
sentences.chinese: 像疟原虫在蚊子和人之间循环一样，弓形虫的循环界于其啮齿类和猫科宿主之间，在不同宿主体内活出不同的生存阶段。

detailed_translations.chinese: 啮齿类的；咬的，嚼的；侵蚀性的

detailed_translations.english: any small animal of the type that has long sharp front teeth, such as a rat or a rabbit

name: coat
trans: n. 外套 vt. 覆盖…的表面 n. (Coat)人名；(法)科阿

sentences.english: Billy! Put your coat on , it’s cold outside!
sentences.chinese: 比利！穿上外套，外面很冷！

sentences.english: The kids took off their coats and threw them on the floor.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们脱下外套扔在地板上。

sentences.english: I need a new winter coat .
sentences.chinese: 我需要一件新的冬衣。

sentences.english: The lab assistants wear long white coats.
sentences.chinese: 实验室助手穿着白色的长外套。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of clothing with long sleeves that is worn over your clothes to protect them or to keep you warm
to cover something with a thin layer of something else

name: famous
trans: adj. 著名的；极好的，非常令人满意的

sentences.english: a famous actor
sentences.chinese: 著名演员

sentences.english: Many famous people have stayed in the hotel.
sentences.chinese: 许多名人都曾下榻这家酒店。

sentences.english: The Eiffel Tower is a famous landmark (= a famous place or building that is easy to recognize ) .
sentences.chinese: 埃菲尔铁塔是著名的地标。

sentences.english: Da Vinci’s world-famous portrait of the Mona Lisa
sentences.chinese: 达•芬奇的那幅闻名世界的肖像画《蒙娜丽莎》

detailed_translations.english: known about by many people in many places

name: India
trans: n. 印度（南亚国家）

sentences.chinese: 缅甸与印度毗邻。

sentences.english: This book treats of the caste system in India.
sentences.chinese: 这本书论述了印度的种姓制度。

sentences.english: If you come to India for just one thing, this should be it.
sentences.chinese: 如果你只为一件事来到印度，那就到这儿来吧。

name: shaggy
trans: adj. 蓬松的；表面粗糙的；毛发粗浓杂乱的

sentences.chinese: 蓬乱的黑胡子

detailed_translations.chinese: 蓬松的；表面粗糙的；毛发粗浓杂乱的
detailed_translations.english: shaggy hair or fur is long and untidy

name: snout
trans: n. 鼻子；猪嘴；烟草；鼻口部；口吻状物

sentences.chinese: 两只鳄鱼把它们的大嘴栖息在水面上。

detailed_translations.chinese: 鼻子；猪嘴；烟草；鼻口部；口吻状物
detailed_translations.english: the long nose of some kinds of animals, such as pigs

name: spot
trans: n. 地点；斑点 vt. 认出；弄脏；用灯光照射 vi. 沾上污渍；满是斑点 adj. 现场的；现货买卖的 adv. 准确地；恰好

sentences.chinese: 海滩上一个安静的好地方

sentences.english: I chose a spot well away from the road.
sentences.chinese: 我选了一个远离马路的地点。

detailed_translations.english: a particular place or area, especially a pleasant place where you spend time

detailed_translations.chinese: 认出， 发现； 玷污
detailed_translations.english: to notice someone or something, especially when they are difficult to see or recognize

trans: n. 小山，丘陵地区；一季所伐的木材；兽皮；折缝 v. 掉下，跌落（fall 的过去式）；砍伐；击倒，打倒；把（接缝的边）缝平 adj. 邪恶的，凶猛的；毁灭性的，致命的 n. (Fell) （美、英、德、法）费尔（人名）

sentences.chinese: 短短一个多小时100多棵树就被砍倒了。

detailed_translations.english: to cut down a tree

sentences.chinese: 我们把拖车挂在汽车尾部。

sentences.chinese: 从后背用钩扣的连衣裙

detailed_translations.english: to fasten or hang sth on sth else using a hook; to be fastened or hanging in this way

name: hung

sentences.chinese: 戴维出生后的第一年左右，我们好像过得还可以。

Okay is also a noun

name: recess
trans: n. 休息；休会；凹处 vt. 使凹进；把…放在隐蔽处 vi. 休息；休假

sentences.english: the deep recesses of the cave
sentences.chinese: 洞穴的幽深处

detailed_translations.english: a space in the wall of a room, especially for shelves, cupboards etc

trans: n. 航空公司；航线 adj. 航线的

sentences.chinese: 航空公司飞行员

detailed_translations.english: a company that takes passengers and goods to different places by plane

name: airport
trans: n. 机场；航空站

sentences.chinese: 飞机降落在希思罗机场。

sentences.chinese: 她的家人去机场送她。

name: check in

name: plane

sentences.chinese: 这是一家大航空公司，拥有庞大的机群。

sentences.english: It’s much quicker to go by plane.
sentences.chinese: 乘飞机去会快很多。

sentences.english: She slept on the plane.
sentences.chinese: 她在飞机上睡着了。

sentences.chinese: 天太暗，无法继续寻找。

sentences.chinese: 这一地区已被彻底搜查过。

sentences.chinese: 我到处找我的眼镜。

detailed_translations.english: to try to find someone or something by looking very carefully

trans: n. 旅行者；旅客；旅行推销员（等于traveller）

sentences.chinese: 消息是这个旅行者，要从一个特定的机场到另一个特定的机场。

sentences.chinese: 就这样，演员不知经历了多少世纪，横跨过多少心智，模仿着他们的所能与所是，渐渐的，他和那个荒谬的个体，那个旅行者，有了许多共同之处。

name: behave
trans: vi. 表现；（机器等）运转；举止端正；（事物）起某种作用 vt. 使守规矩；使表现得…

sentences.chinese: 她表现得很有责任心。

sentences.english: I couldn't believe these people were behaving in this way.
sentences.chinese: 我无法相信这些人竟这样行事。

detailed_translations.chinese: 表现，举止；运转，做出反应

name: cheer
trans: n. 欢呼，喝彩声；愉快，欢乐的气氛；让人开心的理由；加油歌，加油诗；（喜庆场合供应的）酒菜 v. 欢呼，加油；安慰，鼓舞；（使）高兴起来 n. (Cheer) （美、英、加、澳）舍尔（人名）

sentences.chinese: 消防员到达时，大家都欢呼起来。

sentences.english: The audience was shouting and cheering.
sentences.chinese: 观众在呐喊欢呼。

sentences.english: The spectators cheered him wildly.
sentences.chinese: 观众拼命为他加油。

detailed_translations.english: to shout as a way of showing happiness, praise, approval, or support of someone or something

detailed_translations.chinese: 欢呼；愉快；心情；令人愉快的事
detailed_translations.english: a shout of happiness, praise, approval, or encouragement

name: movies
trans: n. （美）[电影] 电影（movie的复数）

name: ready
trans: adj. 准备好；现成的；迅速的；情愿的；快要…的 n. 现款；预备好的状态 adv. 迅速地；预先 vt. 使准备好 n. (Ready)人名；(英)雷迪

sentences.chinese: 快点，你还没准备好吗？

sentences.english: When the doorbell rang he was ready and waiting .
sentences.chinese: 门铃响的时候，他已经准备好在等着了。

sentences.english: Why does it take you so long to get ready to go out?
sentences.chinese: 你外出怎么要准备那么长时间？

sentences.english: He's always ready to help his friends.
sentences.chinese: 他总是乐意帮助朋友。

detailed_translations.english: fully prepared for what you are going to do

name: theater
trans: n. 电影院，戏院，剧场；戏剧；手术室

sentences.english: It ushered in the new theater season.
sentences.chinese: 它预示了新的戏剧旺季的来临。

sentences.english: The theater emptied when the movie ended.
sentences.chinese: 电影结束了， 剧院里的人就走空了。

sentences.english: You know, like fencing, or theater or something.
sentences.chinese: 你知道，像是击剑，戏剧表演或什么的。

name: ticket
trans: n. 票；入场券，标签；（美）候选人名单；证明书；交通罚款单 vt. 加标签于；指派；对…开出交通违规罚单

sentences.english: Slow down or you'll get a ticket.
sentences.chinese: 开慢点儿，否则你会接到一张罚款通知单。

sentences.english: parking/speeding ticket
sentences.chinese: 违法停车/超速行驶罚款单

detailed_translations.english: a printed note ordering you to pay money because you have done something illegal while driving or parking your car

name: drink
trans: v. 喝，饮；喝酒；把……喝完，干杯；（比喻）陶醉于；（非正式）吸收（水分）；（酒）喝起来有某种滋味；举杯庆贺 n. 酒；饮料；一杯（饮料或酒）；饮，喝酒，贪杯，酗酒

sentences.chinese: 你应该大量喝水。

sentences.english: What would you like to drink?
sentences.chinese: 你想喝点什么？

sentences.english: Take a seat while I get you something to drink .
sentences.chinese: 请坐，我去给你倒杯喝的。

sentences.english: She filled the glass and drank.
sentences.chinese: 她把杯子倒满后喝了起来。

detailed_translations.english: to take liquid into your mouth and swallow it
to take liquid into your mouth and swallow it
an amount of liquid that you drink, or the act of drinking something

name: flock
trans: n. 群；棉束（等于floc） vt. 用棉束填满 vi. 聚集；成群而行 n. (Flock)人名；(德、瑞典)弗洛克

sentences.english: People have been flocking to the exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 看展览的人络绎不绝。

detailed_translations.english: to go or gather together somewhere in large numbers

name: pack

sentences.english: I forgot to pack my razor.
sentences.chinese: 我忘记把剃须刀放入行李包了。

sentences.english: Hundreds of people packed into the mosque.

name: trouble
trans: n. 麻烦；烦恼；故障；动乱 vt. 麻烦；使烦恼；折磨 vi. 费心，烦恼

sentences.english: Recent stock market losses point to trouble ahead.
sentences.chinese: 最近股市的下跌预示着未来将有麻烦。

detailed_translations.english: problems or difficulties
to say something or ask someone to do something which may use or waste their time or upset them

name: grab
trans: vt. 攫取；霸占；将…深深吸引 vi. 攫取；夺取 n. 攫取；霸占；夺取之物

sentences.english: I grabbed my bag and ran off.
sentences.chinese: 我抓起我的包就跑。

sentences.english: Two men grabbed her and pushed her to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 两名男子抓住她，把她推倒在地上。

sentences.english: Kay grabbed hold of my arm to stop herself falling.
sentences.chinese: 凯抓住我的手臂，以免自己摔倒。

detailed_translations.chinese: 抓取，攫取；赶紧做；抓住；抓，夺
detailed_translations.english: to take hold of someone or something with a sudden or violent movement
to suddenly try to take hold of something

name: manners
trans: n. 礼貌（manner的复数形式） n. (Manners)人名；(英、瑞典)曼纳斯

sentences.english: You should be ashamed of your bad manners.
sentences.chinese: 你应该对自己的不礼貌感到羞耻。

name: napkin
trans: n. 餐巾；餐巾纸；尿布

sentences.english: ...taking tiny bites of a hot dog and daintily wiping my lips with a napkin.
sentences.chinese: …小口咬着热狗并用餐巾文雅地擦着我的嘴唇。

detailed_translations.english: a square piece of cloth or paper used for protecting your clothes and for cleaning your hands and lips during a meal

name: sip
trans: v. 小口喝，抿 n.  一小口（饮料），一啜之量 n. (Sip) （美、荷）西普（人名）

sentences.english: Bees sip honey from flowers and hum their thanks when they leave.
sentences.chinese: 蜜蜂从花中啜蜜，离开时营营地道谢。 獥，% 韐罔。

sentences.english: We afford you the opportunity to dine with delight, to sip in style, to relax in Comfort.
sentences.chinese: 我们将竭诚为您提供愉快进餐的良机，优雅的啜饮，舒适的休憩。

detailed_translations.chinese: 小口喝， 抿； 一小口的量
detailed_translations.english: a very small amount of a drink

name: slurp
trans: vt. 出声地吃或喝 vi. 出声地吃或喝 n. 吃的声音；啜食声

sentences.english: He blew on his soup before slurping it off the spoon.
sentences.chinese: 他先吹了吹汤，然后出声地从匙子里喝汤。

detailed_translations.english: to drink a liquid while making a noisy sucking sound

name: wipe
trans: vt. 擦；消除；涂上 vi. 擦；打 n. 擦拭；用力打

sentences.english: I'll just wipe the table.
sentences.chinese: 我只擦擦桌子。

detailed_translations.english: to remove liquid, dirt, or marks by wiping
a wiping movement with a cloth

name: booth
trans: n. 货摊；公用电话亭 n. (Booth)人名；(英)布思；(德、瑞典)博特

sentences.english: I called her from a public phone booth near the entrance to the bar.
sentences.chinese: 我在酒吧入口附近的一个公用电话亭给她打了电话。

detailed_translations.english: A booth is a small area separated from a larger public area by screens or thin walls where, for example, people can make a telephone call or vote in private

name: change
trans: v. 改变，转变，（使）不同；（使）变换；替代，更换；交换；货币兑换；将……换成零钱；退还 n. 变化，改变；替代物；换洗衣物；零钱，硬币；换乘；全新体验；新月相的出现

sentences.english: I find it hard to cope with change.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得很难适应变化。

sentences.english: scientists worried about climatic change
sentences.chinese: 为气候变化感到担忧的科学家们

sentences.english: A change in personality may mean your teenager has a drug problem.
sentences.chinese: 十几岁的孩子如果性格上发生了变化，可能意味着有吸毒问题。

sentences.english: No major changes were made to the book.
sentences.chinese: 这本书没有大的修改。

sentences.english: She had a change of heart (= change in attitude ) and decided to stay.
sentences.chinese: 她改变主意，决定留下来。

sentences.english: Family life has undergone dramatic change in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 近年来家庭生活发生了巨大的变化。

sentences.english: Matt emptied the loose change from his pockets.
sentences.chinese: 马特把口袋里所有的零钱都掏了出来。

detailed_translations.english: the process or result of something or someone becoming different

name: count
trans: v. 数数；计算总数；把……算入，包括；重要；正式接纳；认为，看作 n. 总数；数数；量的计数；事项，罪状；观点；伯爵；（纱线的）支数 n. (Count) （美）康特（人名）

sentences.english: Davis was found not guilty on all counts .
sentences.chinese: 戴维斯受到指控的各项罪名均不成立。

detailed_translations.english: one of the crimes that someone is charged with

name: sticker
trans: n. 粘贴标签，张贴物；坚持不懈的人；尖刀；难题 n. (Sticker) （美、德、法、澳大利亚）施蒂克（人名）

name: vote
trans: n. 投票，选举；选票；得票数 vt. 提议，使投票；投票决定；公认 vi. 选举，投票 n. (Vote)人名；(英、法)沃特

sentences.english: A vote for us is not a wasted vote.
sentences.chinese: 投我们的票是不会白投的。

sentences.english: The proposal was rejected by 19 votes to 7.
sentences.chinese: 那项提议以19票对7票被否决。

sentences.english: policies designed to win votes in the South
sentences.chinese: 旨在赢取南方选票的各项政策

sentences.english: It’s the club secretary that counts the votes.
sentences.chinese: 俱乐部干事负责清点选票。

detailed_translations.english: an act of voting in an elec­tion or meeting, or the choice that you make when you vote

detailed_translations.chinese: 提议，使投票；投票决定；公认
detailed_translations.english: to show which person or party you want, or whether you support a plan, by marking a piece of paper, raising your hand etc

name: come
trans: vi. 来；开始；出现；发生；变成；到达 vt. 做；假装；将满（…岁） int. 嗨！ n. (Come)人名；(英)科姆；(阿尔巴)乔梅

sentences.english: Let me know when they come.
sentences.chinese: 他们来了就告诉我。

sentences.english: Can you come here for a minute?
sentences.chinese: 你到这里来一会儿好吗？

sentences.english: Come a bit closer and you’ll be able to see better.
sentences.chinese: 靠近一些就能看得更清楚。

sentences.english: What time will you be coming home ?
sentences.chinese: 你什么时候能回家？

detailed_translations.english: to move towards you or arrive at the place where you are

name: cookie
trans: n. 饼干；小甜点

sentences.english: a glass of milk and a cookie
sentences.chinese: 一杯牛奶和一块小甜饼

sentences.english: a chocolate chip cookie
sentences.chinese: 带巧克力碎粒的小甜饼

detailed_translations.english: a small flat sweet cake

name: farm
trans: n. 农场；农舍；养殖场，饲养场；生产（或加工）企业 v. 种田，务农，从事畜牧业；将......外包；把（某人）寄养在外；（暂时）转让，外租；将（税收）包出

sentences.english: a 300-hectare farm
sentences.chinese: 一座300公顷的农场

sentences.english: farm workers
sentences.chinese: 农场工人

sentences.english: farm animals
sentences.chinese: 农场牲畜

sentences.english: Joe had worked on the farm all his life.
sentences.chinese: 乔在农场干了一辈子。

detailed_translations.english: an area of land used for growing crops or keeping animals

name: fence
trans: n. 栅栏；围墙；剑术 vt. 防护；用篱笆围住；练习剑术 vi. 击剑；搪塞；围以栅栏；跳过栅栏

sentences.english: Villagers say the fence would restrict public access to the hills.
sentences.chinese: 村民们说栅栏将限制公众进入山区。

detailed_translations.english: a structure made of wood, metal etc that surrounds a piece of land

detailed_translations.chinese: 防护；用篱笆围住；练习剑术
detailed_translations.english: to fight with a long thin sword as a sport

name: growl
trans: v. （动物，尤指狗）发出低吠声；低声咆哮着说；（事物）发隆隆声 n. （尤指狗发出的）低吠；（人发出的）咆哮；（机器或引擎发出的）隆隆声

sentences.english: And then the lights go off, and the din of the tourists turns from a momentary grumble of protest to a greedy growl to whispered disappointment.
sentences.chinese: 这时灯光熄灭了，一时间游客的噪声从短暂的抗议的抱怨声变成了贪婪的咆哮声，接着变成了低语的失望声。

sentences.english: Then we hear a louder growl. Guess who is growling?
sentences.chinese: 然后我们听到了一声更大的咆哮。猜猜是谁在咆哮？

sentences.english: If they get too close, I might squirt them with a bad-smelling spray. I also can growl or screech.
sentences.chinese: 如果它们靠近我, 我可能向它们喷出一种恶臭的液体，我也可能咆哮或尖叫。

sentences.english: Their noise modulated to a concerted menacing growl punctuated by sharp yaps.
sentences.chinese: 它们的喧闹声逐渐变为整齐划一的、带有威胁性的吼叫，还夹杂着刺耳的狂吠。

detailed_translations.english: Growl is also a noun

name: mall
trans: n. 商场，购物广场；步行商业区；步行道；铁圈球球场 n. (Mall) （美、瑞）迈勒（人名）

sentences.english: In the winter I head for the mall.
sentences.chinese: 在冬日里,我前往这个购物商场。

sentences.english: If you see something you like at the mall, walk away.
sentences.chinese: 如果在商城里看见某件你喜欢的东西，（别买）走开。

name: helicopter
trans: n. [航] 直升飞机 vi. [航] 乘直升飞机 vt. 由直升机运送

sentences.english: You can helicopter to the island.
sentences.chinese: 你可以乘坐直升机去那个岛。

sentences.english: The helicopter is staying over our heads.
sentences.chinese: 那架直升机就在我们头顶的上方。

sentences.english: They were succoured from the fire by the rescue helicopter.
sentences.chinese: 他们被援救的直升机从大火中解救了出来。

detailed_translations.english: a type of aircraft with large metal blades on top which turn around very quickly to make it fly

name: machine
trans: n. 机械，机器；机构；机械般工作的人 vt. 用机器制造 n. (Machine)人名；(意)马基内

sentences.english: Could you get me a coffee from the drinks machine ?
sentences.chinese: 给我从自动饮料机里买一罐咖啡好吗？

sentences.english: The fax machine is broken.
sentences.chinese: 传真机坏了。

sentences.english: Did you put my dirty shirts in the machine (= washing machine ) ?
sentences.chinese: 你把我的脏衬衫放进洗衣机里了吗？

sentences.english: I left a message for you on your machine (= telephone answering machine ) .
sentences.chinese: 我在你的电话答录机里留了言。

sentences.english: The machine wouldn’t let me have any money (= cash machine ) .
sentences.chinese: 自动取款机不让我取钱。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment with moving parts that uses power such as electricity to do a particular job

name: mask
trans: n. 面具；口罩；掩饰 vi. 掩饰；戴面具；化装 vt. 掩饰；戴面具；使模糊

sentences.english: a surgical face mask
sentences.chinese: 外科手术口罩

sentences.english: He was attacked and robbed by two people wearing masks .
sentences.chinese: 他被两个蒙面人袭击并抢劫。

detailed_translations.english: something that covers all or part of your face, to protect or to hide it
if a smell, taste, sound etc is masked by a stronger one, it cannot be noticed because of the stronger one

name: spray
trans: n. 喷雾，喷雾剂；喷雾器；水沫 vt. 喷射 vi. 喷 n. (Spray)人名；(英)斯普雷

sentences.english: spray from the waves
sentences.chinese: 海浪溅起的水雾

sentences.english: a new hair styling spray
sentences.chinese: 一种新的定型喷发剂

sentences.english: Most farmers use pesticide sprays.
sentences.chinese: 大多数农民都使用喷雾杀虫剂。

sentences.english: She sprayed herself with perfume.
sentences.chinese: 她往身上喷了香水。

detailed_translations.english: water in very small drops that is blown from the sea etc or sent up by vehicles on a wet road
to force liquid out of a container so that it comes out in a stream of very small drops and covers an area

name: tool
trans: n. 工具，用具；器械，机床；手段 vi. 使用工具；用机床装备工厂 vt. 用工具给……加工

sentences.english: I don’t have the right tools to start fiddling around with the engine.
sentences.chinese: 我没有合适的工具来摆弄发动机。

sentences.english: a shop selling garden tools
sentences.chinese: 出售园艺工具的商店

detailed_translations.chinese: 工具，用具；器械，机床；手段
detailed_translations.english: something that you hold in your hand and use to do a particular job

detailed_translations.chinese: 使用工具；用机床装备工厂

name: boat
trans: n. 小船；轮船 vi. 划船

sentences.english: a fishing boat
sentences.chinese: 渔船

sentences.english: The boat capsized (=  turned over  ) in heavy seas.
sentences.chinese: 船在波涛汹涌的大海上倾覆了。

sentences.english: a boat trip around the islands
sentences.chinese: 乘船环岛旅行

detailed_translations.english: a vehicle that travels across water

name: fish
trans: n. 鱼；鱼肉；双鱼座；接合板；（非正式）怪人；（非正式）鱼雷 v. 钓鱼，捕鱼；搜寻；打听消息；打捞；用接合板修补 n. (Fish) （美、爱）菲施（人名）

sentences.english: Over 1,500 different species of fish inhabit the waters around the reef.
sentences.chinese: 那片礁石周围的水域生活着1,500多种不同的鱼类。

sentences.english: The stonefish is the most deadly of all fishes.
sentences.chinese: 石鱼是所有鱼类中毒性最强的。

sentences.english: You usually drinks white wine with fish.
sentences.chinese: 白葡萄酒一般配鱼喝

sentences.english: Dad really loves to fish.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸很喜欢钓鱼。

detailed_translations.english: an animal that lives in water, and uses its fins and tail to swim
to try to catch fish

name: lake
trans: n. 湖；深红色颜料；胭脂红 vt. （使）血球溶解 vi. （使）血球溶解 n. (Lake)人名；(德、塞、瑞典)拉克；(英)莱克

sentences.english: Lake Michigan
sentences.chinese: 密歇根湖

detailed_translations.english: a large area of water surrounded by land

name: pole
trans: n. 杆；极点；电极 vt. 用竿支撑 n. (Pole)人名；(英)波尔；(俄)波列；(塞)波莱

sentences.english: a telephone pole
sentences.chinese: 电话线杆

detailed_translations.english: a long stick or post usually made of wood or metal, often set upright in the ground to support something
to push a boat along in the water using a pole

name: worm
trans: n. 虫，蠕虫；蜗杆；螺纹；小人物 vt. 使蠕动；给除虫；使缓慢前进 vi. 慢慢前进；蠕行 n. (Worm)人名；(德、丹、葡)沃尔姆

sentences.english: ...a new computer worm that disables security software.
sentences.chinese: …一种使安全软件失灵的新型计算机蠕虫病毒。

detailed_translations.chinese: 虫，蠕虫；蜗杆；螺纹；小人物
detailed_translations.english: a long thin creature with no bones and no legs that lives in soil

detailed_translations.chinese: 使蠕动；给除虫；使缓慢前进

name: alien
trans: adj. 外国的；相异的，性质不同的；不相容的 n. 外国人，外侨；外星人 vt. 让渡，转让 n. (Alien)人名；(法)阿利安

sentences.english: alien cultures
sentences.chinese: 异域文化

sentences.english: an alien multiracial society
sentences.chinese: 一个多种族的异国社会

detailed_translations.chinese: 外国的；相异的，性质不同的；不相容的
detailed_translations.english: belonging to another country or race
someone who is not a legal citizen of the country they are living or working in

name: astronaut
trans: n. 宇航员，航天员；太空旅行者

sentences.english: So why become an astronaut at all?
sentences.chinese: 那么，为什么要成为一名宇航员呢？

sentences.english: Yes, I have wanted to be an astronaut.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我想过成为一个宇航员。

sentences.english: Many different qualities go towards the making of an astronaut.
sentences.chinese: 一名宇航员必须具备许多不同的素质。

detailed_translations.english: someone who travels and works in a spacecraft

name: pretend
trans: vi. 假装，伪装，佯装 adj. 假装的 vt. 假装，伪装，模拟

sentences.english: Let’s pretend we’re on the moon.
sentences.chinese: 我们假装自己是在月球上吧。

sentences.english: He’s not asleep – he’s just pretending.
sentences.chinese: 他并没睡着，不过是装睡而已。

sentences.english: To pretend ignorance of the situation would be irresponsible.
sentences.chinese: 装作不知情是不负责任的做法。

sentences.english: I can’t marry her and to pretend otherwise would be wrong.
sentences.chinese: 我不可以娶她，装作娶她无妨是不对的。

detailed_translations.english: to behave as if something is true when in fact you know it is not, in order to deceive people or for fun
imaginary or not real - used especially by children

name: submarine
trans: n. 潜水艇；海底生物 adj. 海底的；水下的 vt. 用潜水艇攻击 vi. 在下疾行；在下滑动

sentences.english: submarine plant life
sentences.chinese: 海生植物

detailed_translations.english: growing or used under the sea
a ship, especially a military one, that can stay under water

name: warrior
trans: n. 战士，勇士；鼓吹战争的人

sentences.english: a noble warrior
sentences.chinese: 忠勇的战士

detailed_translations.chinese: 战士，勇士；鼓吹战争的人
detailed_translations.english: a soldier or fighter who is brave and experienced – used about people in the past

name: flashlight
trans: n. 手电筒；闪光灯

sentences.english: Wicky peeked at John's flashlight.
sentences.chinese: 威奇向约翰的手电筒瞥了一眼。

sentences.english: Do you have a flashlight?
sentences.chinese: 你有没有手电筒？

detailed_translations.english: a small electric light that you can carry in your hand

name: flight
trans: n. 飞行；班机；逃走 vt. 射击；使惊飞 vi. 迁徙 n. (Flight)人名；(英)弗莱特

sentences.english: He immediately booked a flight to Toulouse.
sentences.chinese: 他当即就订了去图卢兹的航班。

sentences.english: In 1968, the first supersonic airliner took flight (= began flying ) .
sentences.chinese: 1968年，首架超音速客机飞上天空。

sentences.english: When the alarm sounded, the whole gang took flight.
sentences.chinese: 警报响起，一帮人全逃跑了。

detailed_translations.english: a journey in a plane or space vehicle, or the plane or vehicle that is making the journey

name: howl
trans: v. （狗、狼等）嚎叫；（因疼痛、愤怒等）大声叫喊；（风）怒号；怒吼；嚎啕大哭 n. （狗、狼等的）嚎叫；（因痛苦、恐惧等的）吼叫；（劲风的）呼啸；颤噪效应

sentences.english: wind howling in the trees
sentences.chinese: 在林间呼啸的风

sentences.english: Somewhere a dog suddenly howled, baying at the moon.
sentences.chinese: 某个地方的一只狗突然嗥叫起来，对着月亮狂吠。

detailed_translations.english: if the wind howls, it makes a loud high sound as it blows
If an animal such as a wolf or a dog howls, it makes a long, loud, crying sound

detailed_translations.chinese: 嗥叫； 呼啸；吼叫； 哀号
detailed_translations.english: a loud high sound made by the wind blowing

name: shadow
trans: n. 阴影；影子；幽灵；庇护；隐蔽处 vt. 遮蔽；使朦胧；尾随；预示 vi. 变阴暗 adj. 影子内阁的

sentences.english: the long dark shadow of an old oak tree

sentences.english: Nora was an excellent gymnast in this country.
sentences.chinese: 诺拉是这个国家卓越的体操运动员。

sentences.english: I was 26 by then -- which is ancient for a male gymnast.
sentences.chinese: 我那时26岁，作为一名男子体操运动员已经太老了。

sentences.english: Ah, the perspective of the proud gymnast.
sentences.chinese: 嘿，自以为是的体操运动员的观点。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is good at gymnastics and competes against other people in gymnastics competitions

name: split
trans: v. 分裂，使分裂（成不同的派别）；分开，使分开（成为几个部份）；（使）撕裂；分担，分享；划破，割破；结束婚姻（或感情、工作）关系；迅速离开；使（原子）产生核裂变；泄露（某人的）秘密，告发某人；（头）剧痛 n. 裂口，裂缝；分离，分裂，分歧；（尤指钱的）分配，份额；区分，不同；劈叉（the splits）；（婚姻、感情、工作关系的）结束；被切为两半的小圆面包（或面包卷、蛋糕）；（用于编篮子的）劈开的柳条；（织布机筘排上的）钢筘（或竹筘）；半瓶（或半杯）香槟酒（或其他酒）；（分层剖开的）一层兽皮；（地滚球中）隔号余柱；错层式房屋；（赛跑）跑完一段距离所耗的时间，分段耗时；平局，连续打成平局的比赛 adj. 分裂的

sentences.english: The branch split under their weight.
sentences.chinese: 树枝承受不住他们的重量断裂了。

sentences.english: In a severe gale the ship split in two.
sentences.chinese: 在一次强劲的大风中那艘船断成了两半。

sentences.english: If the chicken is fairly small, you may simply split it in half.
sentences.chinese: 要是鸡不太大，你把它分成两半就行。

detailed_translations.english: to divide or separate something into different parts or groups, or to be divided into different parts or groups
If something splits or if you split it, it is divided into two or more parts

name: stretch
trans: v. （柔软或弹性物）伸展；拉紧；（使）过分延长；（资金、资源）足够；大量要求；（使）最大限度利用（才能）；夸大；延续 n. （四肢或身体的）舒展；（肌肉的）伸张；（材料或服装的）伸展力；困难的任务；（陆地或水域）连绵的一片；（时间）连续的一段；（非正式）服刑期；（赛马跑道的）终点直道；抢风航行的距离；（非正式）加长机动车 adj. 弹性的，可拉伸的 n. (Stretch) （美）斯特雷奇（人名）

sentences.english: Carl sat up in bed, yawned, and stretched.
sentences.chinese: 卡尔从床上坐起来，打了个呵欠，伸了伸懒 腰。

sentences.english: Always stretch before exercising.
sentences.chinese: 锻炼之前都要做伸展运动。

detailed_translations.english: to straighten your arms, legs, or body to full length
to reach a long way for something

detailed_translations.chinese: 一段时间； 一段距离；延伸， 连绵； 连绵的一片
detailed_translations.english: a continuous period of time

name: trampoline
trans: n. 蹦床；弹簧垫

name: flake
trans: n. 小薄片，碎片；古怪的人；搁架；坚硬石片；（卷绳或盘索的）一圈 v. 剥落，将……剥落；使……成薄片；（非正式）入睡，筋疲力尽；把（绳子）松松挽好 n. (Flake) （美）弗拉克（人名）

sentences.english: chocolate flakes
sentences.chinese: 巧克力薄片

detailed_translations.english: a small thin piece that breaks away easily from something else
to break off in small thin pieces

name: important
trans: adj. 重要的，重大的；有地位的；有权力的

sentences.english: a very important meeting
sentences.chinese: 很重要的会议

sentences.english: The accident taught him an important lesson.
sentences.chinese: 那次事故给了他很大的教训。

sentences.english: Happiness is more important than money.
sentences.chinese: 快乐比金钱更重要。

sentences.english: ‘What did you say?’ ‘Oh, nothing important.’
sentences.chinese: “你说什么？”“噢，没什么大事。”

sentences.english: It’s vitally important that you understand the danger.
sentences.chinese: 了解危险所在是极为重要的。

sentences.english: a very important customer
sentences.chinese: 一位大客户

detailed_translations.english: an important event, decision, problem etc has a big effect or influence on people’s lives or on events in the future

name: nervous
trans: adj. 神经的；紧张不安的；强健有力的

sentences.english: I wish you’d stop looking at me like that. You’re making me nervous.
sentences.chinese: 我希望你不要再那样看着我了，你让我紧张。

sentences.english: By the time I got into the interview I was a nervous wreck (= was extremely nervous ).
sentences.chinese: 到了面试的时候，我紧张得要命。

detailed_translations.english: worried or frightened about something, and unable to relax

name: run
trans: vi. 经营；奔跑；运转 vt. 管理，经营；运行；参赛 n. 奔跑；赛跑；趋向；奔跑的路程 n. (Run)人名；(塞)鲁恩

sentences.english: For a while, she ran a restaurant in Boston.
sentences.chinese: 有一段时间她在波士顿开餐馆。

sentences.english: Many people don’t care who runs the country.
sentences.chinese: 很多人不在乎由谁统治国家。

sentences.english: Courses are currently being run in London and Edinburgh.
sentences.chinese: 目前伦敦和爱丁堡两地都开设了这些课程。

sentences.english: Many people belong to a pension scheme run by their employers.
sentences.chinese: 许多人参加了由雇主管理的养老金计划。

sentences.english: a state-run (= controlled by the government ) television station
sentences.chinese: 国营电视台

detailed_translations.english: to organize or be in charge of an activity, business, organization, or country

detailed_translations.chinese: 奔跑；赛跑；趋向；奔跑的路程
detailed_translations.english: to be very busy and continuously rushing about

name: study
trans: n. 学习，研究；课题；书房；学问 vt. 学习；考虑；攻读；细察 vi. 研究；用功 n. (Study)人名；(英)斯塔迪

sentences.english: Recent studies show that women still get paid a lot less than men.
sentences.chinese: 最近的调查表明，女性的薪水仍比男性的要低很多。

sentences.english: The study was carried out between January and May 2008.
sentences.chinese: 这项研究是在 2008 年1月到5月间进行的。

sentences.english: Set aside a period of time specifically for study.
sentences.chinese: 留出一段时间专门用于学习

sentences.english: I’ve been studying English for six years
sentences.chinese: 我学英语已有六年了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 研究 (对某一课题或问题的)；中文释义: 学习 (尤指在家里或放学后的)
detailed_translations.english: a piece of work that is done to find out more about a particular subject or problem, and usually includes a written report

detailed_translations.chinese: 中文释义: 学习，攻读
detailed_translations.english: to learn about a subject at school, university etc

name: subway
trans: n. 地铁；地道 vi. 乘地铁

sentences.english: the New York City subway
sentences.chinese: 纽约市的地铁

sentences.english: a crowded subway station
sentences.chinese: 拥挤的地铁站

sentences.english: Boston has the oldest subway system in the US.
sentences.chinese: 波士顿拥有美国最老的地铁运输系统。

detailed_translations.english: a railway system that runs under the ground below a big city

name: Chinese
trans: adj. (Chinese) 中国的；中国人的；汉语的 n. (Chinese) 中国人，华人；汉语；（非正式）中餐，中餐馆 n. (Chinese) （美、印、澳、巴）奇内斯（人名）

sentences.english: Do you fancy going out for a Chinese?
sentences.chinese: 你想不想出去吃顿中餐？

detailed_translations.english: relating to China, its people, or its language
people from China

name: garden
trans: n. 花园；菜园 vt. 栽培花木 vi. 从事园艺；在园中种植 n. (Garden)人名；(英、意、巴基)加登

sentences.english: He’s outside in the garden.
sentences.chinese: 他在外面花园里。

sentences.english: Grace brought us some flowers from her garden.
sentences.chinese: 格雷丝给我们送来一些她花园里的花。

sentences.english: the botanical gardens in Edinburgh
sentences.chinese: 爱丁堡的植物园

detailed_translations.english: piece of land next to or around your house where you can grow flowers, fruit, vegetables, etc., usually with an area of grass(called a lawn )

name: glad
trans: adj. 高兴的；乐意的 vt. 使......高兴 n. (Glad)人名；(塞、瑞典)格拉德；(英)格莱德；(法、挪)格拉

sentences.english: We’re so glad you came.
sentences.chinese: 你来了我们真高兴。

sentences.english: ‘I’ve decided to accept the job.’ ‘I’m glad.’
sentences.chinese: “我决定接受这份工作。”“我很高兴。”

sentences.english: I’d be glad if you’d let me know when the funeral is.
sentences.chinese: 如果你能告诉我葬礼的时间，我将非常感激。

detailed_translations.english: pleased and happy about something

name: mirror
trans: n. 镜子；真实的写照；榜样 vt. 反射；反映

sentences.english: He spends hours in front of the mirror !
sentences.chinese: 他老是照镜子！

sentences.english: When I looked in the mirror I couldn’t believe it. I looked fantastic!
sentences.chinese: 我看着镜子简直不敢相信，我看上去棒极了！

sentences.english: Henry’s sad smile mirrored that of his son.
sentences.chinese: 亨利脸上那苦涩的笑容跟他儿子一模一样。

sentences.english: The economic recovery in Britain was mirrored in the US.
sentences.chinese: 美国出现了和英国相似的经济复苏。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of special glass that you can look at and see yourself in
if one thing mirrors another, it is very similar to it and may seem to copy or represent it

name: stand
trans: vi. 站立；位于；停滞 vt. 使站立；忍受；抵抗 n. 站立；立场；看台；停止

sentences.english: It looks like we’ll have to stand – there are no seats left.
sentences.chinese: 看来我们只能站着——没有座位了。

sentences.english: She stood in the doorway.
sentences.chinese: 她站在门口。

sentences.english: (= do not move ) and listen to me.
sentences.chinese: 站好别动，听我说。

sentences.english: Don’t just stand there (= stand and not do anything ) – help me!
sentences.chinese: 不要光站在那里，帮帮我！

detailed_translations.english: to support yourself on your feet or be in an upright position
used to say that you do not like someone or something at all, or that you think that something is extremely unpleasant
a piece of furniture or equipment used to hold or support something

name: earn
trans: vt. 赚，赚得；获得，挣得；使得到；博得 n. (Earn)人名；(泰)炎

sentences.english: He earns nearly £20,000 a year.
sentences.chinese: 他每年挣近20,000英镑。

sentences.english: You don’t earn much money being a nurse.
sentences.chinese: 当护士挣钱并不多。

sentences.english: He did all sorts of jobs to earn a living.
sentences.chinese: 他为谋生什么活都干。

sentences.english: I was the only person in the house who was earning.
sentences.chinese: 我是家里唯一上班挣钱的人。

sentences.english: She was earning good money at the bank.
sentences.chinese: 她在银行工作，收入不错。

sentences.english: You could earn a higher rate of interest elsewhere.
sentences.chinese: 你在别处可以获得更高的利率。

detailed_translations.english: to receive a particular amount of money for the work that you do

name: money
trans: n. 钱；货币；财富 n. (Money)人名；(英)莫尼；(西、法)莫内

sentences.english: Don’t spend all your money on the first day of your holiday!
sentences.chinese: 别在度假的第一天就把钱都花完了！

sentences.english: The repairs will cost quite a lot of money.
sentences.chinese: 修理要花一大笔钱。

sentences.english: The family made their money in the woollen trade.
sentences.chinese: 这家人是做毛纺生意赚的钱。

detailed_translations.english: what you earn by working and can use to buy things. Money can be in the form of notes and coins or cheques, and can be kept in a bank

name: proud
trans: adj. 自豪的；得意的；自负的；突出的 n. (Proud)人名；(英)普劳德

sentences.english: a proud man who would not admit his mistakes
sentences.chinese: 自以为是、不愿认错的男子

sentences.english: Seth was the proud owner of a new sports car.
sentences.chinese: 赛思因为有了新跑车而扬扬得意。

detailed_translations.chinese: 骄傲的；自负的〔含贬义〕；自豪的
detailed_translations.english: thinking that you are more important, skilful etc than you really are – used to show disapproval

name: rake
trans: n. 耙子，靶状物；浪子； 倾斜度（尤指剧院舞台）；（切割工具的）前刀面；客车车厢 v. 用耙子耙；扫射 ；搜寻；（树枝或手指甲）刮擦；（用耙子）耙松；（船桅或烟囱）向船尾倾斜；确定（尤指舞台的）倾斜度 n. (Rake) （美、印）雷克 （人名）

sentences.english: The searchlight raked the open ground around the prison.
sentences.chinese: 探照灯在监狱周围的空地上来回扫射。

detailed_translations.chinese: 搜索；用耙子耙；掠过，擦过
detailed_translations.english: to move a rake across a surface in order to make the soil level, gather dead leaves etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 耙子；斜度；钱耙；放荡的人，浪子
detailed_translations.english: a gardening tool with a row of metal teeth at the end of a long handle, used for making soil level, gathering up dead leaves etc

name: weed
trans: n. 野草；水草；（非正式）烟草；（非正式）大麻烟；（非正式）体弱的人；（非正式）瘦弱的马 v. 除草；剔除 n. (Weed) （美、英、加、印、澳）威德（人名）

sentences.english: the constant battle against weeds
sentences.chinese: 对付杂草的长期斗争

sentences.english: I've been weeding the flower beds.
sentences.chinese: 我一直在除花坛里的杂草。

detailed_translations.english: a wild plant growing where it is not wanted that prevents crops or garden flowers from growing properly
to remove unwanted plants from a garden or other place

name: cowboy
trans: n. 牛仔；牧童；莽撞的人

sentences.english: Boys used to play at cowboys and Indians.
sentences.chinese: 男孩子们过去常玩牛仔和印第安人的游戏。

detailed_translations.english: in the US, a man who rides a horse and whose job is to care for cattle

name: doctor
trans: n. 医生；博士；（作头衔或称呼）牙医；诊所；（非正式）建议者；博学的人；人造蝇；凉爽海风；（非正式）船上的厨师 v. 篡改，伪造；在（食物或饮料中）添加有害物质；阉割（动物）；为……治病；授以博士学位；修理（机器）；干扰（球）；就医，行医

sentences.english: She was treated by her local doctor.
sentences.chinese: 她由她的本区医生治疗。

sentences.english: I’d like to make an appointment to see Dr Pugh.
sentences.chinese: 我想预约看皮尤医生。

sentences.english: a Doctor of Law
sentences.chinese: 法学博士

detailed_translations.english: someone who is trained to treat people who are ill

name: glasses
trans: n. [轻] 眼镜；玻璃（glass的复数形式）；双筒望远镜 v. 把…装入玻璃容器内；给…装上玻璃（glass的第三人称单数形式）

sentences.english: ...the 140 million Americans who wear glasses or contact lenses.
sentences.chinese: …1.4亿戴眼镜或者隐性眼镜的美国人。

detailed_translations.english: Glasses are two lenses in a frame that some people wear in front of their eyes in order to help them see better

name: people
trans: n. 人；人类；民族；公民 vt. 居住于；使住满人

sentences.english: How many people were at the meeting?
sentences.chinese: 有多少人到会？

sentences.english: At least 40 people were killed.
sentences.chinese: 至少有40人遇害。

sentences.english: He pledged that he would never lie to the American people.
sentences.chinese: 他保证绝不对美国人民撒谎。

detailed_translations.english: used as the plural of ‘person’ to refer to men, women, and children

name: police officer
trans: n. 警官；警员

sentences.english: The police officer said your country [Pakistan] is not secure but I still prefer to live there. I love my country.
sentences.chinese: 警官说你们巴基斯坦现在也不安全，但是我仍然希望回到祖国去生活，我爱我的祖国。

sentences.english: The laws specify, for example, that the police officer administering a photo or live lineup should not know who the suspect is, and the witness should be told that the officer does not know.
sentences.chinese: 法律详细规定的有，如，警官在处理照片或一列待指认嫌疑人时不能先入为主地知道谁是嫌犯，而目击证人在指证时也应被告知，警察不知道谁是嫌犯。

sentences.english: The police officer led him to a beautiful garden with lots of grass, pretty flowers, and manicured hedges.
sentences.chinese: 警官带着他到一个很美的花园，里面有很多的草，很多的花，修剪好的树坪。

detailed_translations.english: a member of the police

name: dessert
trans: n. 餐后甜点；甜点心 n. (Dessert)人名；(法)德塞尔

sentences.english: She had homemade ice cream for dessert.
sentences.chinese: 她吃了些自制冰淇淋当餐后甜点。

detailed_translations.english: sweet food served after the main part of a meal

name: gobble
trans: vi. 贪食；咯咯叫 vt. 狼吞虎咽 n. 火鸡叫声

sentences.english: The gobble sound, from the male turkeys, on the other hand, sounds exactly like you’d expect from the name and they do this all the time.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面来说，雄火鸡发出的咯咯声听上去绝对就是你从它们的名字就能预料到的那样，而火鸡一直如此。

detailed_translations.english: to make a sound like a  turkey
the loud rapid gurgling sound made by male turkeys

name: invite
trans: vt. 邀请，招待；招致 n. 邀请

sentences.english: I’m afraid I wasn’t invited.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕我没有受到邀请。

sentences.english: Successful candidates will be invited for interview next week.
sentences.chinese: 通过甄别的候选人将获邀于下周参加面试。

detailed_translations.english: to ask someone to come to a party, wedding, meal etc

name: problem
trans: n. 难题；引起麻烦的人 adj. 成问题的；难处理的

sentences.english: She was older than me, but that wasn’t really a problem.
sentences.chinese: 她比我年长，不过那不算什么问题。

sentences.english: She gave us 20 mathematical problems to solve.
sentences.chinese: 她让我们解20道数学题。

detailed_translations.english: a situation that causes difficulties

name: soar
trans: vi. 急升，激增；高飞；升空；翱翔；（树木、建筑物等）高耸；（情绪）高涨 n. 高飞；高涨 n. (Soar) 人名；（英、葡）索尔

sentences.english: Her temperature soared.
sentences.chinese: 她的体温骤然升高。

sentences.english: The price of petrol has soared in recent weeks.
sentences.chinese: 最近几个星期汽油价格猛涨。

sentences.english: soaring unemployment
sentences.chinese: 急剧上升的失业率

detailed_translations.english: to increase quickly to a high level

name: clue
trans: n. 线索；（故事等的）情节 vt. 为…提供线索；为…提供情况

sentences.english: Police have found a vital clue .
sentences.chinese: 警方发现了至关重要的线索。

sentences.english: Archaeological evidence will provide clues about what the building was used for.
sentences.chinese: 考古证据将为这幢建筑的用途提供线索。

sentences.english: a desperate search for clues
sentences.chinese: 拼命寻找线索

detailed_translations.english: an object or piece of information that helps someone solve a crime or mystery

name: form
trans: n. 形式，形状；形态，外形；方式；表格 vt. 构成，组成；排列，组织；产生，塑造 vi. 形成，构成；排列 n. (Form)人名；(英)福姆；(法、德)福尔姆

sentences.english: We oppose racism in all its forms.
sentences.chinese: 我们反对各种形式的种族主义。

sentences.english: The female form is a thing of beauty.
sentences.chinese: 女性形体是一种美。

sentences.english: The rocks were formed more than 4,000 million years ago.
sentences.chinese: 这些岩石是40多亿年前形成的。

detailed_translations.english: the way something is or appears to be

trans: n. 化石；僵化的事物；顽固不化的人 adj. 化石的；陈腐的，守旧的

sentences.english: fossils of early reptiles
sentences.chinese: 早期爬行动物的化石

sentences.english: He’s one of the greatest living composers.
sentences.chinese: 他是仍然健在的最伟大的作曲家之一。

sentences.english: The sun affects all living things (= people, animals, and plants ).
sentences.chinese: 太阳与一切生物息息相关。

sentences.english: It’s not a great job, but it’s a living.
sentences.chinese: 这不是什么了不起的工作，不过是一种生计。

detailed_translations.english: alive now

name: past

sentences.chinese: 从以往的表现来看，简应该会干得很好。

sentences.chinese: 根据过去的经验，她知道和他争论是没有用的。

sentences.english: Study some past exam papers to get an idea of the questions.
sentences.chinese: 仔细看看以前的一些考卷，了解一下考题。

sentences.english: It’s time she stopped living in the past (= thinking only about the past ) and began to think about her future.
sentences.chinese: 她不该再沉湎过去，应开始想想将来。

detailed_translations.english: done, used, or experienced before now
the time that existed before the present

name: stony
trans: adj. 石头覆盖的；石头制的；像石头的；无情的；石质的

sentences.english: stony soil
sentences.chinese: 石质土

detailed_translations.english: covered by stones or containing stones

name: ache
trans: v. （持续的）疼痛；渴望；哀痛，怜悯；感到痛苦 n. （身体某部位的）疼痛；痛苦（一种恼人或苦乐参半的情感） n. (Ache) （美、印尼、法）阿切（人名）

trans: n. 流感 n. (Flu)人名；(法)弗吕

sentences.chinese: 史蒂文患了流感，仍卧病在床。

sentences.chinese: 她得了流感。

sentences.chinese: 我得了流感，去不了。

sentences.english: Doctors now fear a flu epidemic .

If you moan, you make a low sound, usually because you are unhappy or in pain

trans: vi. 打喷嚏 n. 喷嚏

sentences.chinese: 她开始咳嗽、打喷嚏。

sentences.chinese: 灰尘使他打起了喷嚏。

sentences.chinese: 他拽出一块脏手帕，捏着一角向我挥动。

name: roller coaster
trans: 过山车；云霄飞车；情绪急转突变

sentences.chinese: 能坐5次过山车而不吐真够棒的。

detailed_translations.english: a track with very steep slopes and curves, which people ride on in small carriages at  fair s  and  amusement park s

trans: n. 隧道；坑道；洞穴通道 vt. 挖；在…打开通道；在…挖掘隧道 vi. 挖掘隧道；打开通道

sentences.english: the Channel Tunnel (= between England and France )

sentences.chinese: 风从东北方向吹来。

sentences.chinese: 衣橱太重，我一个人移不动。

sentences.chinese: 玛丽亚的苹果馅饼秘方

sentences.chinese: 这些精美瓷器只在特殊场合使用。

sentences.chinese: 你最好马上卖掉摩托车换成现款。

sentences.chinese: 车辆来往的嘈杂声令我无法入睡。

sentences.chinese: 一杯柠檬汽水

sentences.english: Would you like a lemonade?
sentences.chinese: 你要来一杯柠檬汽水吗？

name: pasta

sentences.chinese: 活跃好动的年轻人玩的游戏

sentences.chinese: 她80多岁了，但仍旧很活跃。

trans: adj. 疯狂的；发疯的；愚蠢的；着迷的 n. 狂怒

sentences.english: He can’t possibly get that finished in time. He must be mad !
sentences.chinese: 他不可能按时完成的。他一定是疯了！

sentences.chinese: 如果我整天困在家里我会发疯的。

sentences.english: He’s been driving me mad !
sentences.chinese: 他真让我受不了！

sentences.english: You’ve agreed to marry him! Are you mad?
sentences.chinese: 你已经同意跟他结婚了！你疯了吗？

sentences.english: Surely no one would be mad enough to fly in this weather?
sentences.chinese: 肯定没有人会傻到在这样的天气条件下飞行吧？

sentences.english: My friends all think I’m stark raving mad (= completely crazy ) .
sentences.chinese: 我的朋友都认为我是彻底疯了。

sentences.english: It’s enough to send you barking mad (= completely crazy ) .
sentences.chinese: 这足以让你发狂。

detailed_translations.chinese: 疯狂的；发疯的；愚蠢的；着迷的
detailed_translations.english: crazy or very silly

name: share
trans: v. 分享，共用；分配；有同样的感情（或经历）；分担 n. 份，份额；股份；责任，贡献 n. (Share) （美）沙雷（人名）

sentences.english: As a kid he’d never share his toys.
sentences.chinese: 他小时候从不肯与人分享他的玩具。

detailed_translations.english: to let someone have or use something that belongs to you
one of the equal parts into which the  ownership  of a company is divided

name: air conditioner
trans: n. 空调机，空调设备（=air-conditioner）

sentences.english: The air conditioner was just what the Brooklyn printer needed.
sentences.chinese: 这种空调设备正好是布鲁克林印刷机所需要的。

sentences.english: There’s no denying, though, that a good air conditioner can beat the heat.
sentences.chinese: 可是，不可否认的是，好的空调设备可以抵御炎热。

sentences.english: However, for a while the land around the city acted as a natural air conditioner, keeping the air cool through evaporation of moisture from the ground.
sentences.chinese: 不过，有一段时间，莫斯科市周围的土地起到了自然空调的作用，通过从地面蒸发湿气保持空气凉爽。

detailed_translations.english: a machine that makes the air in a room or building cooler and drier

name: dishwasher
trans: n. 洗碗工；洗碟机

sentences.english: Finally, rinse the cutting board again with hot water or toss it in the dishwasher.
sentences.chinese: 最后，再次用热水冲洗切菜板，或者将它放入洗碗机里清洗。

detailed_translations.english: a machine that washes dishes

trans: n. 烘干机；[助剂] 干燥剂 n. (Dryer)人名；(英)德赖尔

sentences.english: Unlike other clothes, you cannot use a dryer for fireproofing a cloth.
sentences.chinese: 不像其他的衣服，你不能用烘干机把防火衣烘干。

sentences.english: Oh, that sweet day when I moved into an apartment with a washer/dryer connection!
sentences.chinese: 哦，当我搬进一座有洗衣机/烘干机连接着的公寓时，是多少甜蜜的一天。

detailed_translations.chinese: 烘干机；[助剂] 干燥剂

sentences.english: Doctors recommend eating less salt.
sentences.chinese: 医生建议少吃盐。

sentences.english: In recent years she has appeared in public less frequently.
sentences.chinese: 近年来她在公开场合露面的次数少了。

detailed_translations.english: a smaller amount or not as much

name: arch
trans: n. 弓形，拱形；拱门 adj. 主要的 vt. 使…弯成弓形；用拱连接 vi. 拱起；成为弓形 n. (Arch)人名；(德)阿尔希；(英)阿奇

sentences.chinese: 从通向公园外的拱门下走过时，米拉高兴地喊叫起来。

sentences.english: A set of changes in the mongoose’s receptor makes it resemble the cobra’s own resistant receptor.
sentences.chinese: 猫鼬受体的一系列变化使得它们类似于眼镜蛇自己的抗毒液性受体。

sentences.english: Sometimes an attacking mongoose is bitten, but it has another line of defense against the venom — its acetylcholine receptor has also evolved so that the cobra neurotoxin cannot bind to it.
sentences.chinese: 有时猫鼬也会被咬到，但它还有除了反应之外的第二种防御毒液的方式——它的乙酰胆碱受体同样进化到了不怕眼镜蛇神经毒素的地步。

sentences.english: However, when cornered, these snakes will raise their heads, sometimes with a third of their body off the ground, spread their cobra-like neck-flap, open their black mouths and hiss.
sentences.chinese: 但是，当被逼到角落时，这些蛇就会抬起头部，有时会有三分之一脱离地面，舒展开它们眼镜蛇般的脖颈，打开黑色的嘴发出嘶嘶的声音。

name: pose
trans: vt. 造成，形成；摆姿势；装模作样；提出…讨论 vi. 摆姿势；佯装；矫揉造作 n. 姿势，姿态；装模作样

sentences.chinese: 我们深夜到达伦敦。

sentences.chinese: 她伸手从包里取出一张名片。

sentences.chinese: 我一周做两次瑜伽。

detailed_translations.chinese: 瑜珈（意为“结合”，指修行）；瑜珈术
detailed_translations.english: a system of exercises that help you control your mind and body in order to relax

sentences.english: Does Paul stilllive here?
sentences.chinese: 保罗还住在这儿吗？

sentences.english: We’re still looking for somewhere to live.
sentences.chinese: 我们还在找住的地方。

sentences.english: Rabbits make good pets .

sentences.english: {"COLLOINEXA":["pet food"]}
sentences.chinese: 宠物粮食

sentences.chinese: 警察伸出手，摸了摸那条猎狼犬。

sentences.chinese: 通用汽车公司总裁

sentences.chinese: 她担心地看了我一眼。

sentences.chinese: 主要作物是燕麦和大麦。

sentences.chinese: 他们沿海岸筑起一道堤坝以拦住海水。

sentences.chinese: 庞大的消费品市场

sentences.english: Britain’s leading exporter of manufactured goods

sentences.chinese: 有一些商品和服务将要增税。

sentences.chinese: 尽量在日常生活中安排一些经常性的锻炼。

sentences.chinese: 你今天早晨心情不错啊！

sentences.chinese: 他的额头上冒出了汗珠。

sentences.english: I was sweating a lot despite the air conditioning.
sentences.chinese: 尽管开着空调，我仍是满头大汗。

detailed_translations.english: drops of salty liquid that come out through your skin when you are hot, frightened, ill, or doing exercise
to have drops of salty liquid coming out through your skin because you are hot, ill, frightened, or doing exercise

name: chore
trans: n. 家庭杂务；日常的零星事务；讨厌的或累人的工作

sentences.english: everyday chores like shopping and housework
sentences.chinese: 购物和做家务之类的日常琐事

sentences.english: We share the domestic chores.
sentences.chinese: 我们分担家务。

detailed_translations.chinese: 家庭杂务；日常的零星事务；讨厌的或累人的工作
detailed_translations.english: a small job that you have to do regularly, especially work that you do to keep a house clean

name: clean
trans: adj. 清洁的，干净的；清白的 vt. 使干净 vi. 打扫，清扫 adv. 完全地 n. 打扫 n. (Clean)人名；(英)克林

sentences.english: Are your hands clean?
sentences.chinese: 你的手干净吗？

sentences.english: clean towels
sentences.chinese: 干净的毛巾

sentences.english: Make sure you keep the wound clean .
sentences.chinese: 一定要保持伤口清洁。

sentences.english: Wipe that sink clean when you’re done.
sentences.chinese: 洗完后将水槽擦干净。

sentences.english: As usual, she left her room clean and tidy before going to school.
sentences.chinese: 和往常一样，她去上学之前把房间收拾得干干净净。

sentences.english: a spotlessly clean kitchen
sentences.chinese: 一尘不染的厨房

sentences.english: Oh, don’t get mad - it’s just good clean fun !
sentences.chinese: 噢，不要生气——这不过是个正经的玩笑嘛！

detailed_translations.english: without any dirt, marks etc

name: toss
trans: v. 抛，投；甩（头）；颠簸；摇匀；把（煎饼）颠起翻面；掷硬币决定；（马）摔下（骑手）；（非正式）搜（某地） n. 掷硬币决定；猛仰头（表恼怒）；投掷 n. (Toss) （美）托斯（人名）

sentences.english: I’ve been tossing and turning all night.
sentences.chinese: 我一晚上辗转反侧。

detailed_translations.chinese: 掷钱币来决定；翻来覆去
detailed_translations.english: to keep changing your position in bed because you cannot sleep

detailed_translations.chinese: 扔，抛，掷；猛抬；拌；掷；使摇动，使颠簸
detailed_translations.english: to throw something, especially something light, with a quick gentle movement of your hand

detailed_translations.chinese: 掷钱币来决定； 猛抬头
detailed_translations.english: the act of throwing a coin in the air to decide something, especially who will do something first in a game

name: trash
trans: n. 垃圾；废物 vt. 丢弃；修剪树枝

sentences.english: Will someone take out the trash (= take it outside the house ) ?
sentences.chinese: 谁把垃圾拿出去好吗？

sentences.english: Just put it in the trash .
sentences.chinese: 就把它扔到垃圾桶里吧。

detailed_translations.english: things that you throw away, such as empty bottles, used papers, food that has gone bad etc
